title: Havent received second mastery token
body: I haven't received second mastery token on Miss Fortune no matter how many S- or S i get its just bugged. Please someone know what the issue is here.

replies.body:
Your only recent games with MF appear to be in ARAMs? You can only earn Mastery 6 and 7 tokens in SR normal and ranked.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q7
